features: Personalize your home office with the functional Ameriwood Home Parsons Large Desk with 2 Drawers for double the space and double the drawers
Fits perfectly in your home office or den
Desk top comes preassembled – just attach the legs. Assembled dimensions: 30"h x 47.7"w x 19.7"d. Shipping weight is approximately 40.37 lbs
The white finish brings a timeless style to any room
Constructed of laminated hollow core, MDF and particleboard making this desk sturdy and long lasting
body.description: Redefine your workspace or any room in your home with the sleek, minimalist lines of this attractive Ameriwood Home Parsons Large Desk with 2 Drawer. This Desk is designed with classic parsons styling that includes a simple silhouette with clean lines. Furniture style Contemporary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Work From Home With a wide variety of desks, file storage, and bookcases, you are sure to find what you need easily and comfortably work from home!

L Desk Our spacious L-shaped desks give you the ability to place your desk in the corner or in the middle of your home office to define your workspace however you need. The large desktop provides plenty of space for your computer or laptop, printer, and projects so you can work from home with ease. Writing Desk Perfect for small spaces, our writing desks offer valuable workspace in a compact size. These desk are ideal for smaller apartments, dorm rooms, or bedroom home office spaces. Lift Top Desks Comfortably work from home with our convenient lift-top desks. Go from sitting to standing with ease so you are always able to work from a comfortable position. Our durable metal lift-top mechanisms allow you to simply adjust your desktop height and are sturdy enough to last for years! Desks with Storage No need to bring clutter into your home office! Our desks with storage offer shelves and/or drawers to keep your home office neat and organized so you can focus on work! L-Desk Writing Desk Lift-Top Desks Desks with Storage

Options Bookcases with Doors Whether you need a place to organize books and manuals or need more storage for extra office supplies, our bookcases with doors provide plenty of storage for home office essentials. The doors will keep your items dust free and offer an elegant upgrade to your home office. Open Shelf Bookcases Whether you need a place to organize books and manuals or need more storage for extra office supplies, our open shelf bookcases provide plenty of storage for home office essentials. Available in 3, 4, or 5 shelves, you will have all the space you need to have easy access to work from home essentials. File Cabinet Keep your important documents stored away and organized with our lateral file cabinets. The large drawers can hold both legal and letter size files, so you always have easy access to the paperwork you need. Use as a printer stand to free up desk space, perfect for smaller workspaces!

Dakota L Desk with Bookshelves Lawrence 4 Shelf Ladder Bookcase Core 2 Drawer File Cabinet Parsons Desk with Drawer Haven Retro Desk with Riser Available Colors Black Oak, White, Espresso, Gray, Rustic Oak Black Black, Espresso Black, White, Espresso and Many More! Walnut, Natural, Gray Oak, White, Espresso Assembled Dimensions 28.31”H x 51.34”W x 53.62”D 60”H x 20.5625”W x 18.5”D 24.4375"H x 15.5625"W x 14.75"D 30”H x 39”W x 19.7”D 35.4”H X 44.7”W X 23.8”D Assembly Required? ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my 10-year-old daughter to use as a vanity. It comes with two drawers however, they’re not very deep. It is made of compressed wood, so it’s not as sturdy as I thought but overall, it’s a great product. It was fairly easy to build also. She loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Super high quality, it already comes assembled the only thing you need to do is attach the legs. Finished “building” the desk in 5 minutes. Worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad desk.
reviews.reviewText: It came on time and was well wrapped. It was easy to put together. My only complaint is that two of the legs were a bit scuffed. Nothing worth sending it back for since it is such a large item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not even worth $30! The WORST desk EVER created.
reviews.reviewText: This might be the worst purchase I've ever made on Amazon, and I truly regret it. Unfortunately the desks at IKEA that I wanted are all out of stock, so I had to resort to this DISASTER. Where to begin. Straight out of the box, nearly EVERY surface has something wrong with it, and not a single one is due to shipping. The top (main desk area) has two large black streaks, and two divots in the finish (again not from shipping). Every single leg has nicks in the edges, excess/messy paint or something else wrong. The inside of the drawers are covered in black splotches, I'm assuming dirty finger prints? The edges of this desk are extremely sharp, so not only dangerous to be around, but even having your arms lean on it like you normally would to type or work is extremely uncomfortable. After less than one day of use, my arms are already irritated and have lines in them constantly when I use. Just so you are aware, since there is no mention of it, this desk is has a TEXTURED surface. The 'white finish' must be very thin because any amount of liquid will cause it to get a dark spot, and in just a few hours of use, somehow I now have permanent oil spots on this desk even though there was no oil on it. Even as I type this out, I can physically see the desk wobbling just from me typing.Every finish and edge on this thing is just overall crap. I don't anticipate this will even last a month. If you think IKEA furniture is low quality, don't even attempt to buy this, as IKEA looks like a Rolls Royce next to this heap of junk.The ONLY thing this has going for it is that it is easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: It came in perfect condition, very easy to assemble and very lightweight which made it easier to move into my bedroom. 10/10 product, it was late in shipping but that’s not an issue since it’s the cutest desk ever! The drawers are nice and the white finish is so clean. Would recommend this desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly cheap desk
reviews.reviewText: First, the desk didn’t arrive (driver took a photo of my door…..but no box was shown.) not the vendors fault, but it added another week+ to the process.When the 2nd one arrived, it was easy to put together but shockingly poor quality. The desk surface will show exposure to even a tiny bit of moisture (it bubbled when I put a glsss with ice on it). The legs have slight curves to them, tightening and loosening didn’t fix it. But it’s still functional. Also the desk and a slight sag to it in the middle. I haven’t put anything heavy on it (heaviest thing being my laptop) so not sure why it’s bowing.And last thing: the drawers are tiny. They don’t go the depth of the desk and are incredibly shallow. One drawer has a hairline crack in it already.So fine if you don’t need perfect and you don’t need to use a desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly! Practical price! Functional!
reviews.reviewText: Got this for room on main floor to use as office desk when working remotely as I was tired of dogs walking between my feet when going to upstairs home office. Plus I have it in front of a window downstairs so I can see why they are barking. Top of desk big enough for two laptops plus writing tablet space. Wide enough for large desktop calendar to doodle on. Two small drawers big enough for office supplies and dog treats for distraction. Easy assembly as top with drawers was already put together. I only had to add the legs. Sturdy enough for desk use but lightweight. Not made for placing heaving items on top. Functional for my needs. Price was right. When I retire, I can move this into my grandson's room of too many toys. I really wanted a French Provincial writing desk with fancy legs, but have you seen the price of those things?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love my desk. It’s very sturdy and a great size for two monitors and a laptop. The desk looks expensive and was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewTitle: great ikea rip off table! easy to assemble very fast, drawer slides are very very nice
reviews.reviewText: will be a great little makeup trial table. loved that this was on amazon with free shipping. assembly is super easy, only needing the 4 legs to be screwed on. the rest is preassembled which is just amazing. the drawer slides are amazing , they are nice ball bearing slow close lock in ones, that was the best suprise here. everything in good shape, up and running in like 15 minutes maybe less. easy 5 star ikea rip off!

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple and solid build, but Drawer Cracked in shipping
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived quickly and on time. Some shipping damage to outer carton and one drawer face was cracked on arrival. There was a page of customer service instructions included in the box. Super easy to request replacement part. Unit seems well built and sturdy. Easy to assemble. I will update if replacement part becomes a problem.

I understand that this desk is not indestructible. But even when I clean it, just with water, the coating swells and does not go back to normal. If you so much as sneeze near this thing, you will ruin it.
My teen granddaughter loves this desk
